item.title: Npc dialogue
item.dc:creator: @x_sam_x1 x sam x
item.description:
@x_sam_x1 wrote:

case 500: if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerAmulet] != 552) { sendNpcChat4("Blurk hangly bingjelllly grefgar!", "Blurk hangly bingjelllly grefgar!", "Blurk hangly bingjelllly grefgar!", "Blurk hangly bingjelllly grefgar!", c.talkingNpc, "Restless_Ghost"); } break;
Dont get any errors but it doesnt work in-game, can anyone help please?
Someone please help me?

item.title: Npc dialogue
item.dc:creator: @x_sam_x1 x sam x
item.description:
@x_sam_x1 wrote:

Hi im making a quest, its been fine up to now, at about half way through the quest you have to get something off restless ghost, but the only way you can speak to him is with ghost speak amulet, im not sure on how to make it say random stuff when you not wearing ghost speak amulet, i tried this: case 382: if(playerEquipment[playerAmulet] != 552) { sendNpcChat4("Blurk hangly bingjelllly grefgar!", "Blurk hangly bingjelllly grefgar!", "Blurk hangly bingjelllly grefgar!", "Blurk hangly bingjelllly grefgar!", c.talkingNpc, "Restless_Ghost"); break; Get 100 errors, does anyone know how to do this??

Read full topic
